channel.title: Clojure on M'Sync
channel.description: Recent content in Clojure on M'Sync

item.title: Notes for Deep Learning with Python
item.description: Chapter-wise notes for <a href="https://www.manning.com/books/deep-learning-with-python-second-edition">Deep Learning with Python</a> with Python and Clojure code samples. The book is not done. These notes are evolving as I get deeper both into the book and the accompanying code.

item.title: Clojure
item.description: Clojure Notes - An aimless dump of anything and everything interesting I find <em>and</em> manage to record.

item.title: Useful Clojure Asides - Logging and Exceptions
item.description: It's always useful to have some nice logging when writing code. Simple logging and exception handling samples to make it a bit easier for the developer.

item.title: Interesting Java in clojure.core
item.description: Some neat Java ideas from the Clojure core

item.title: Developing Chrome Extensions using Clojurescript
item.description: How you may set up your clojurescript project for developing chrome extensions - an example
